channel.title: Gold Prices on FinanClub
channel.description: Recent content in Gold Prices on FinanClub

item.title: BTG
item.description: score:1202 Chances: B2Gold’s Q2 2023 earnings call discussed operational and financial results, including total gold production and performance highlights. B2Gold’s Q2 2023 revenues increased year-over-year due to higher average realized gold prices and increased gold ounces sold. B2Gold delivered positive earnings and revenue surprises for Q2 2023, indicating a potential positive outlook.

item.title: KGC
item.description: score:1000 Chances: Kinross Gold’s positive Q2 2023 earnings call transcript. Renewal of Kinross Gold’s normal course issuer bid (NCIB) program. Earnings and revenue surprises for Kinross Gold in the second quarter of 2023. Declaration of dividend by Kinross Gold for Q2 2023. Expectations of higher earnings for Kinross Gold due to improved production and higher gold prices.
